news_header: In 2022, foundations in Finland supported science, art, and civic activities with a total of 538 million euros.
news_text: According to an independent study conducted by Gaia Consulting for the Association of Foundations and Funds, foundations in Finland provided a total of 538 million euros in support last year. The majority of this funding, 295 million euros, was allocated to science, while art received 85 million euros and civic activities received 158 million euros. Support for science remained stable, whereas funding for art and civic activities increased by approximately 10% in both categories. Over 200 grant foundations and funds were involved in providing this support.
